088350.KS.summary: Hanwha Life Insurance Co., Ltd. provides various insurance products to individual and corporate customers. The company offers child, critical illness, whole life, and variable annuity insurance products. It also provides retirement pension plans; and protection-focused products, including corporate wellbeing life plans, employee's coverage plans, and group medical coverage plans, as well as group savings and welfare corporate plans, and annuities. In addition, the company offers asset management products, such as unsecured loans, loans secured by property, loans by payment guarantees, and policy loans. It offers its products in South Korea, China, Vietnam, Indonesia, the United Kingdom, Hong Kong, and Japan. The company was formerly known as Korea Life Insurance Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hanwha Life Insurance Co., Ltd. in October 2012. Hanwha Life Insurance Co., Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
